name: Wide-grip Push-ups
setup: Start in push-up position with hands placed wider than shoulders
Body in straight line from head to heels
steps: Lower chest toward floor with controlled descent
Keep elbows at 45-degree angle to torso
Descend until chest nearly touches floor
Press through palms to return to starting position
mistakes: Hands too wide causing shoulder strain
safety: If shoulders feel strained, narrow hand position. Avoid excessive elbow flare beyond 45 degrees.

prescriptionHints.notes: Emphasizes chest more than standard push-ups

joints.notes: Monitor shoulder comfort; adjust hand width as needed. Keep wrists neutral.
